SELECT a.fabrics_id AS fabricId, a.fabrics_no AS fabricNo, a.fabrics_name AS fabricName, a.material_type_id AS materialTypeId, a.classic_id AS classicId, a.sp_id AS spId, a.year_code AS yearCode, a.product_type_id AS productTypeId, a.serial_number AS serialNumber, a.pantone_id AS pantoneId, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.remark AS remark, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.position_id AS positionId, a.project_id AS projectId, a.bom_id AS bomId, a.is_show AS isShow, a.composite_classic_id AS compositeClassicId, a.composite_product_type_id AS compositeProductTypeId, a.composite_pantone_id AS compositePantoneId, b.unit_id AS unitId, b.unit_amount AS unitAmount, c.sp_id AS spId, c.order_count AS orderCount, c.attrition_rate AS attritionRate, c.unit_price AS unitPrice, c.total_amount AS totalAmount, c.total_price AS totalPrice, d.dye_id AS dyeId, d.finish_id AS finishId, d.blc_id AS blcId, d.momc_id AS momcId, d.comoc_id AS comocId, d.wvp_id AS wvpId, d.mt_id AS mtId, d.woblc_id AS woblcId, d.specfication_id AS specificationId, d.composite_specfication_id AS compositeSpecificationId, d.composite_dye_id AS compositeDyeId, d.composite_finish_id AS compositeFinishId FROM t_kf_fabrics a LEFT JOIN t_kf_material_unit_dosage b ON a.fabrics_id = b.material_id LEFT JOIN t_kf_material_spinfo c ON a.fabrics_id = c.material_id LEFT JOIN t_kf_fabrics_detail d ON a.fabrics_id = d.fabrics_id WHERE a.bom_id = #{natrualkey} and a.del_flag=0 order by a.name_num ASC
